allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Major cleanup: remove unused code, test artifacts, and organize structure

- Delete Expo/ duplicate directory \(full copy of src/\)
- Delete 5 orphaned screens \(HomeScreen, ProfileScreen, etc.\)
- Delete AWS/archive/ with old Lambda versions
- Delete 100+ test JSON files, log files, and debug artifacts
- Delete build caches \(.expo/, deploy_artifacts/, etc.\)
- Delete sprint docs, misc folders, and temp files
- Move AGENTS.md and PROJECT_HANDOFF.md to docs/
- Rename long logo filename to lodi-shield-logo.png
- Update .gitignore to prevent future clutter

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
